Detailed Description

This file contains the implementation of the APIs present in the device abstraction layer file of CRC. This also contains some related macros.

Function Documentation

void CRCChannelReset ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  channel 
)

This API is used to reset the channel.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the CRC Registers.
channelChannel number for which reset is to be done. Values given by enum crcChannel_t.
Returns
None
void CRCClearIntr ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  channel,
uint32_t  intrMask 
)

This API is used to clear interrupts.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the CRC Registers.
channelChannel number for which interrupt is to clear. Values given by enum crcChannel_t.
intrMaskInterrupt to clear status.
Returns
None
int32_t CRCConfigure ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  channel,
uint32_t  crcPatternCount,
uint32_t  crcSectorCount,
uint32_t  crcMode 
)

This API will configure CRC mode, pattern and sector count for given channel.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the CRC Registers.
channelChannel number to be initialized. Values given by enum crcChannel_t.
crcPatternCountIt is used to check if DMA does supply a block of data responding to a request in a given time frame.
crcSectorCountIt is used to check if DMA does supply a block of data responding to a request in a given time frame.
crcModeCRC operational mode. Refer enum crcOperationMode_t.
Returns
status CRC configuration status

This API is used to disable interrupts.

intrMaskInterrupt to disable.

uint32_t CRCGetHighestPriorityIntrStatus ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

This API is used to get the pending interrupt with highest priority.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the CRC Registers.
Returns
Interrupt vector address Highest priority pending interrupt vector address defined in enum crcIntrPriority_t
uint32_t CRCGetIntrStatus ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  channel 
)

This API is used to get the pending interrupts.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the CRC Registers.
channelChannel number for which pending interrupt is to get. Values given by enum crcChannel_t.
Returns
status Pending interrupt status/occurred.
void CRCGetPSASectorSig ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  channel,
crcSignature_t *  crcSectorSign 
)

This API is used to get Sector Signature Value/ CRC value for given data.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the CRC Registers.
channelChannel number which was configured for CRC calculation. Values given by enum crcChannel_t.
crcSectorSignRefer struct crcSignature_t.
Returns
None
Note
This API should be called after complete transfer of sector/data to PSA register.
void CRCGetPSASig ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  channel,
crcSignature_t *  crcPSASign 
)

This API is used to get the PSA Value.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the CRC Registers.
channelChannel number whose PSA register data is needed. Values given by enum crcChannel_t.
crcPSASignCRC value for sector. Refer struct crcSignature_t.
Returns
None
void CRCGetPSASigRegAddr ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  channel,
crcSignatureRegAddr_t *  crcRegAddr 
)

This API is used to get the PSA register address for given Channel.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the CRC Registers.
channelChannel number whose PSA register address is needed. Values given by enum crcChannel_t.
crcRegAddrPSA register Address for given Channel. Refer structure crcSignatureRegAddr_t.
Returns
None
int32_t CRCInitialize ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  channel,
uint32_t  crcWatchdogPreload,
uint32_t  crcBlockPreload 
)

Initialize CRC channel and will configure watchdog and block preload value for given channel.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the CRC Registers.
channelChannel number to be configured. Values given by enum crcChannel_t.
crcWatchdogPreloadIt is used to check if DMA does supply a block of data responding to a request in a given time frame.
crcBlockPreloadIt is used to check if DMA does supply a block of data responding to a request in a given time frame.
Returns
status CRC Initialization status.
void CRCSetPSASeedSig ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  channel,
const crcSignature_t *  crcPSASeedSign 
)

This API is used to set the PSA Seed Value without compression.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the CRC Registers.
channelChannel number whose PSA Seed Value needs to be set. Values given by enum crcChannel_t.
crcPSASeedSignCRC value for sector. Refer struct crcSignature_t for details.
Returns
None
